title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing a balcony in a dream

preview.html: The balcony or balcony is part of the house and is called the outside because it is the only place from which we can see the road below. This balcony has many uses, whether we are sitting in the evening with family members or we are sitting alone. Read and drink a cup of coffee early in the morning. The symbol of the balcony in the dream. If the dreamer sees in his dream that the balcony is large in size, this means that God will give him a lot of sustenance and money in his real life, which will increase his sense of security and psychological stability. If the dreamer sees that the balcony in his dream is old And unattractive, it means that the dreamer’s image in the eyes of others is very bad. When the dreamer sees that the balcony is not straight or somewhat inclined, this indicates that he feels fear and extreme anxiety. If the dreamer dreams that he is building a new balcony in the dream, this means that His life will change from a bad condition to a good condition and his luck will improve in the coming period. When the dreamer sees that he is sitting on the balcony and feels happy in his dream, this means that he will gain new social relationships and also indicates a noticeable progress in his social and economic level in the near future. If the dreamer sees that he Standing on the balcony and looking at someone he knows on the street with a farewell look, this means that he will leave this person in real life and the relationship between them will not return to what it was before. When the dreamer sees in his dream that the balcony is full of different roses with good smells, this means that good luck He is coming and will solve all his problems that stood in his way from feeling happy in his real life. If the dreamer sees that he is sitting on the balcony with a pen and paper and writing, this means that he is good at planning his life and will succeed in achieving his goals. When the dreamer sees himself standing on the balcony and crying, this means that he will suffer a great loss that will make him lose his balance in the near future. If the dreamer sees himself standing on the balcony and crying, this means that he will suffer a great loss that will make him lose his balance in the near future. If he stands on the balcony for a long time, it means that he is a reserved person who does not reveal his sadness to anyone, and he is also able to solve all his problems and escape from any difficult situation to the maximum extent. Accuracy and wisdom. When a dreamer sees that he is looking at people from his balcony or balcony, it means that he is watching everyone around him and knows everything about them. If the dreamer sees in his dream that the balcony has water stains, it means that there are people who talk bad about him causing disturbances, If he sees urine on the balcony, this means that his diet will be abundant. When a married woman sees that a new balcony is opening, this means that she will leave her old home and buy a new one. For a married woman to see in her dream that she is cleaning the balcony and the basil and jasmine flowers are falling, this indicates Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of the balcony as an indication of the many problems he is experiencing in his life with his family at that time because he does not have his rights. If a person sees a balcony in his dream, then this A sign that there are many things that make him feel bad

title: Interpretation of black hair in a dream. Meaning of black hair in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about dyeing hair black for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman To change the color of dyed hair to black, I dreamed that my hair had become black. Interpretation of a dream about black hair Capital hair is capital and longevity, and the bridle varies depending on the dreamer, and if a man sees him gently on his head, It increases his protection and prestige, and if he sees... He is rich, then it is his money, and if he sees him poor, then it is his sins, and good hair is an honor and glory. Whoever dreams that he has long hair and is happy with it, then he is praiseworthy, especially in women; Because they use other people’s hair for adornment. Dyeing hair black in a dream indicates stability or loneliness and isolation for the pioneer. Whoever dreams of dyeing his hair black, even if his hair is black, then he will move in his life to a new stage that may be happy if he is righteous in his religion, and he may be inclined to Evil and worrying if he is far away. From worship. Excessive dark hair or dark black hair indicates quarrels and quarrels with family, relatives and friends. For a worker or professional employee, this indicates that he is busy with his work and forgetting some important matters in his life. For a pregnant woman, he is tired and has difficulty giving birth. A person’s hair in a dream is his money and strength. Whoever dreams of his hair falling out in a dream This is ruin and ruin for those who are in distress, debt, worry, wealth, or money. Plants or the appearance of hair on a man’s body in a dream may indicate the wife’s pregnancy. Whoever dreams that the hair on his body is white in a dream, and if he is rich, the dream indicates a loss in his money. As for If he is poor and in debt, then the dream shows that his debt can be repaid. Whoever dreams that the hair on his body is pig hair, this indicates the hardships and misfortunes that he is going through. And whoever sees his hair in a dream and the hair of a horse, it shows slavery and fatigue. A man came to Ibn Sirin and said: I saw thick hair on My chest and its knot. title: Interpretation of a dream about rain falling on clothes

preview.html: It is worth noting that seeing wet clothes in a rainy dream can have many interpretations, which vary according to the nature of the dream and the nature of the fortune-teller, and this will be explained in the following lines, so stay with us. A dream about rain falling on clothes When someone dreams of rain falling on clothes. This may be a sign of the dreamer’s repentance and avoidance of forbidden acts that anger God. When a person sees in his dream that rain is falling on his clothes. This indicates that he is characterized by purity and purity of heart. It also shows that those around him carry only elements of honesty and trustworthiness. When a woman sees in her dream that it is raining on her clothes. This may be an indication that she will buy her wedding dress, as it shows that her engagement date is approaching. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that rain is falling on clothes. It may be a sign that she will marry the one she loves because it shows that she will marry someone who loves her and makes her happy in her life. When a married woman dreams of rain falling on her clothes. This may mean that she will live a life full of joy with her husband because it indicates the stability of her family life with the family. If a pregnant woman dreams of rain falling on Her clothes. It may be a sign of good news that she will give birth to a healthy and strong child. Interpretation of a dream about rain falling on clothes for single women If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that rain is falling on her clothes. This may be a sign of her close relationship with a righteous man. She is characterized by love and self-control for her, as it indicates that her life with him is a successful life full of faith and honesty. If an unmarried woman sees calm rain falling on her clothes. This is an indication of the stability of her emotional life and shows that she lives a happy life completely free of problems. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that rain is falling on clothes and is accompanied by lightning and thunder. This may indicate that she is suffering from some crises and problems in her emotional life, but they soon calm down. Interpretation of a dream about rain falling on a man's clothes When a man sees in his dream that rain is falling heavily on his clothes. This is an indication that there is a strong love and has deep roots between her and the one she loves. When a man dreams that rain is falling on his clothes, he is released. This is an indication that he is in a relationship with a good girl, with a good personality and is working to build a happy home with him. If someone sees in his dream that rain is falling on his clothes Only. This may be an indication of the closest feeding for her. If a married man dreams that rain is falling on his clothes. This is an indication that he has been able to get rid of his debts and the problems surrounding him. It also indicates his readiness for worries and sorrows. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of a dream about heavy rain for a married woman Interpretation of a dream about rain falling on the clothes of married people When a married woman dreams of heavy rain falling on her clothes. This may be an indication that she will give birth to a male child. When a married woman dreams of rain falling on her clothes. It may indicate that the fetus is in good health if she is pregnant. If a married woman dreams that rain is falling on her clothes

title: Interpretation of seeing boiled coffee in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing boiled coffee in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, drinks differ whether they are cold or hot, and there are many drinks that are considered universal and that many people around the world love, such as tea and coffee. Coffee, and many people in the world depend on coffee as a morning drink, and some people cannot endure their day without drinking it, and he likes to do it alone, so in this article today we will learn together about me. Interpretation of the vision in a dream of boiling coffee according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing boiled coffee in a dream Interpretation by Ibn SirinIn this paragraph, we will discuss the interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream in detail below. The dream of brewing coffee is a promising dream and a dream worthy of praise. Dream interpretation and visionary scholars show that the interpretation of boiling coffee Coffee in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is going through crises and problems that cause him psychological exhaustion. The vision means the end of problems in the dreamer’s life, so he must be reassured. The scholar Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of boiling coffee in a dream, and the dreamer has concerns in his life, and yet these days will be spent in Salam.Interpretation of a dream about seeing boiled coffee in a dream for a single woman. In this paragraph, we discuss the interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream for a single woman in detail in the following lines. Seeing boiled coffee in a dream means that an unmarried woman will soon improve in her life, as scholars say that the dream portends the girl’s marriage From a man who respects morals and religion. Seeing boiling coffee in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that she is trying to achieve a goal in her life, and the dream indicates that she will get what she is looking for. Dream interpretation and visionary scholars explain that boiling coffee in a girl’s dream is evidence of her success in this world and her arrival. To the highest positions and positions.Interpretation of a dream about seeing boiled coffee in a dream for a man. Many people wonder about the interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream for a man, so in this paragraph we discuss the interpretation of this dream in detail below. Dream interpretation and visionary scholars explain that dreaming about brewing coffee indicates that the dreamer seeks to achieve Success in his career. The dream indicates that he will achieve what he wants and that the job he is looking for will bring him a lot of money. Seeing coffee boiling in a man’s dream means that he will enter a new business in life, but he must be careful because there are hateful people who want him to fail Seeing coffee boiling while the dreamer is sad means that he is carrying pressure in his heart and is going through a psychological crisis, and the dream that came bodes well for him and comfort. Interpretation of a dream of seeing boiling coffee in a dream for a married woman. After we discussed the interpretation of boiling coffee in a dream at the beginning of the article, in this paragraph we consider the interpretation of boiling coffee. In a married woman’s dream in detail below. A dream about boiling coffee in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is living a happy and stable life with her husband. A dream about brewing coffee in a sad married woman’s dream indicates that she is suffering from a problem with someone around her that is causing her problems, and the dream indicates that Peace between them is approaching and life returns to Sala

title: The interpretation of seeing the torment of the grave in a dream is asking the angels in the dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing torture in the grave in a dream is a symbol of the corruption of the dreamer’s religion, because it indicates falsehood and evil, and seeing a dead person being tortured in the grave in a dream means: The dead person needs supplication, and other interpretations vary depending on the state of the god and we present them in detail today. Interpretation of a dream asking the two angels at the grave there. There are many different interpretations of seeing the two angels asking questions in a dream, such as: Seeing the two angels asking questions in a dream is evidence of strong faith and fear of God. But not answering the two angels’ question is evidence of the distance until you reach this matter. As for seeing angels, it is goodness and victory, as well as a blessing and strength. Interpretation of seeing a grave in a dream: Seeing a grave in a dream has many meanings, including: The grave indicates a return to God, repentance, and stopping sins. But if a person sees a grave and feels fear in a dream, this indicates security in the dreamer’s real life. But if he sees the ruler burying people in the graves This indicates the justice of the ruler and his closeness to the subjects. But if he sees the presence of the ruler in the graves and the people around him crying, this indicates the presence of injustice against the people without a solution from the ruler. If one sees that a friend is buried in a grave in a dream, this is evidence that This friend will bring him many problems and he must be careful. The interpretation of seeing the torment of the grave in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing the torment of the grave in a dream according to Ibn Sirin has many interpretations, including: The torment of the grave in a dream indicates the corruption of the dreamer’s religion and his distance from God. But if he sees that He seeks God’s punishment from the punishment of the grave, as this indicates the uprightness of the dreamer’s religion and work for the sake of the afterlife. As for reading verses about the punishment of the grave in a dream, it is an indication that the dreamer will fall into adversity and trouble. As for hearing verses about the punishment of the grave, it is a warning to the dreamer to stay away from sin. While The fear of hearing Qur’anic verses about the torment of the grave is evidence of the weakness of the Prophet’s faith. Interpretation of seeing the torment of the grave in a dream for an unmarried woman. The interpretation of seeing the torment of the grave in a dream for a single woman has different meanings, namely: If an unmarried woman sees the grave, this indicates her marriage, but if she sees herself entering The grave against her will means that she will marry a young man whom she does not love and live a miserable life. But if she sees that she is digging a grave in a dream, this is evidence of her reluctance to marry and leave her family. But if she sees that she is visiting the graves of her family, then it is a good vision and good news about an abundance of food and an abundance of perfume. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream her father’s grave surrounded by snakes, this indicates the deceased’s bad behavior and disobedience to God, and she must give a lot of charity for her father’s soul due to his great need for good deeds. If she sees green plants near her mother’s grave, this indicates that she gave her mother a lot of charity. Which made her feel safe in her grave, and she performed many good deeds. Interpretation of seeing an open grave in a dream When talking about the interpretation of the torment of the grave in a dream, the vision of an open grave must also be mentioned, including: The open grave in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her refusal to marry and her intense attachment. with her family,

title: Learn about the most important interpretations of seeing watermelon in a dream from Ibn Sirin and eating watermelon in a dream

preview.html: Seeing watermelon in a dream: The connotations of watermelon in a dream vary between the positive messages it conveys to the viewer or a warning of the consequences of certain actions he takes, and this depends on the context of the dream and the condition of the viewer who will appear. In fact, with an accurate and reliable interpretation, and in this article you will find all the details related to seeing watermelon in a dream by major interpretation scholars. Seeing watermelon in a dreamIn the interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream, jurists say it indicates the abundance of food and a happy life in well-being and psychological and material stability, if the food is sweet and symbolizes The profits he makes in his work, and this meaning is confirmed when the fortuneteller eats a lot of it in the dream, and feeding watermelon to the fortuneteller shows the calm and tranquility that he will enjoy in his life, and the interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream varies according to the details. From the dream, the color of watermelon and the feeling of the dreamer. Seeing watermelon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the dreamer’s dream of obtaining a large amount of watermelon expresses the increasing burdens and responsibilities on his shoulders, so he is surrounded by his anxiety to think about the future, while in the dream he eats a small amount of it and feels it. . The sweetness of its taste reflects a state of calm and psychological stability that the dreamer experiences. In reality, watermelon in a dream means illness and suffering, if its shape repulses the dreamer. Sometimes the interpretation varies depending on the color of the watermelon that the viewer finds in the dream. For example, green watermelon may carry positive connotations of nourishment, blessing, and comfort. Of anxiety, while seeing red watermelon can have negative connotations according to the appearance and feeling of the dreamer in the dream, while white watermelon means treating the dreamer from any diseases and enjoying wellness and health. Enter the dream interpretation site on the Internet from Google and you will find all the interpretations you are looking for. Seeing watermelon In a dream for a single woman: Seeing watermelon in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her marriage to a suitable life partner whom she chooses with all her will and emotions... the matter. And if she dreams that she is comparing a large group of watermelons and trying to choose the best one, then this symbolizes her confusion regarding the issue of cooperation and her fear of passing... An experiment that ultimately fails. But you cannot afford to print it. Seeing watermelon in a dream for a married woman. title: Interpretation of a dream when seeing Surat Ad-Dhariyat being read or heard in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream: Seeing reading or hearing Surah Ad-Diriyah in a dream, and seeing reading Surat Ad-Diriyah in a dream, indicates abundance of sustenance, abundance of money and wealth, as well as good treatment and good treatment. Whoever sees these visions and dreams with fear and anxiety because of these visions and dreams, seeing or hearing Surah Ad-Dariyyat has many interpretations that people search for when they see this Surah in a dream. We will explain it to you through the following lines. Follow us. Interpretation of the dream of seeing one reading or listening to Surah Ad-Dhariyat in a dream for a single woman. That means seeing or hearing a girl in a dream, which is Surat Ad-Dhariyat. This girl will enjoy a good and abundant life very soon. Likewise, seeing a girl in a dream or hearing Surah. Al-Dariaat indicates the engagement of this girl soon. A good young man has many good qualities. In addition To hear an unmarried girl in her dream refers to Surat Ad-Dariyyat. To get this girl a new, high-level job. Interpretation of a dream about seeing one read or listen to Surat Al-Dhariyat in a dream for a married woman. Seeing or hearing a married woman in a dream Surat Al-Dhariyat. This indicates that this woman She keeps her home and its secrets from everyone. She does not reveal the secrets of her husband or her home to anyone. When a married woman hears Surat Al-Dhariyat in her dream. This shows that next to her husband, this woman is attached to her. Her husband has a strong relationship full of love, compassion, and mutual respect. When she sees or hears a married woman In her sleep, Surat Al-Nasl, this indicates that this woman will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of a dream about seeing one read or listen to Surat Al-Dhariyat in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing or hearing Surat Al-Dhariyat about a pregnant woman indicates that this woman God will bless her with a son who has many qualities. Praiseworthy. Also, when a pregnant woman sees or hears Surat Al-Dhariyat in a dream, this indicates that this woman is close to her due date. If a pregnant woman sees Surah Al-Dhariyat in a dream, it means that she is pregnant. That this woman is going through an easy and safe birth process. She and her child do not feel a lot of pain and pain. Interpretation of a dream about reading or hearing Surat Al-Dhariyat in a dream for a divorced woman. A divorced woman sees or hears Surat Al-Dhariyat in her dream. This indicates that this woman is going through a long period of problems and disagreements with her ex-husband. Seeing or hearing a divorced woman in her dream Surah Al-Dhariyat. It appears that this woman will get rid of all disagreements and problems. This vision also indicates the beginning of a new life with this woman. Someone proposes to her and is characterized by a lot of love. The praiseworthy qualities that make up everything she went through with her ex-husband. Interpretation of a dream about seeing One reads or listens to Surah Al-Dhariyat in a man’s dream. Seeing a man or hearing Surah Al-Dhariyat in a dream indicates that this man will soon marry a girl who has many good qualities. Listening to a man in a dream Surah Al-Dhariyat indicates that. A person is always ready to do good and get closer. From God Almighty. Seeing a man in a dream while reciting Surat Al-Dar

title: Seeing the Black Stone in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Black Stone in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It is a symbol of the sacred religious symbols for many Muslims, which they greatly desire to see and kiss if possible. Many people also dream of it because of their intense desire to see it in reality. To interpret seeing the Black Stone in a dream, there are many The explanations mentioned by major scholars, including Ibn Sirin, which we will present to you today through this article in the encyclopedia. Black Stone: The Black Stone is one of the sacred stones that Muslims love and respect very much. Omar Ibn Al-Khattab said about him: “I know that you are a stone that does no harm or benefit, If I had not seen the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, I would have kissed you when I saw you. Also, one of the things that the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, mentioned is that he said about the Black Stone that it is one of the stones of Paradise, as the Black Stone has a very excellent position in circumambulation, as it begins and ends with it, and its location is in the southeastern corner of the Holy Kaaba. Interpretation of seeing the Black Stone In a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great dream interpreter, Ibn Sirin, believes that seeing the Black Stone in a dream is great evidence of the goodness, justice, and guidance that God Almighty gives to the forerunner. It may also be a sign of an upcoming visit that the fortuneteller will make to the Sacred House of God to perform the rituals of Hajj or Umrah. Seeing the Black Stone in a dream indicates that the dreamer follows the Sunnah of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, and is guided by it in his life. Seeing the Black Stone in a dream indicates that the dreamer is trying to stay away from all sins and misdeeds and is searching for the path of truth and goodness and avoiding the path of Satan. The dreamer of the black stone means that he will obtain all the desires that he expected to be impossible and that God will satisfy him in the near future, and in this case he should thank God for his great generosity and favor upon him. Sometimes seeing the black stone is a sign of the dreamer’s remorse for sins and transgressions and asking for forgiveness and pardon from God. The Almighty. A black hole in a dream can symbolize meeting an important person or one who enjoys a great status or status in society. Seeing a black stone in a dream may be good news for the dreamer that he will soon marry, God willing, a girl known for her justice and piety. Interpretation of shaking hands with a black stone in a dream for a son Sirin: If the dreamer finds in his dream that he is shaking hands with the Black Stone, this is a sign that he supports the ruler or pledges allegiance to him, or that he will repent to God Almighty thanks to one of the scholars or rulers. Shaking hands with the Black Stone in a dream may indicate that he is one of the righteous sons and it may also be a sign of That he will obtain an important position or that he will work with the ruler. Interpretation of kissing the Black Stone in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Kissing the Black Stone in the dreamer’s dream is a sign of meeting a person of high status or great status in the world and perhaps a sign of meeting people whom the dreamer loves deeply. He saw The unmarried dreamer himself kissing the black stone may herald marriage soon, God willing. Interpretation of cutting or losing the black stone in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees in a dream that he is cutting the black stone, this is more likely to happen.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hiding in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream: Hidden in a dream: Children play in the alleys and squares around their homes, streets, and alleys, as there were no clubs and places designated for children to play, so they played many popular games that enhance and develop their talents. Their skills and make them feel very happy and enjoyable, and these games are not limited to young children, as adults also play them, and among the famous games are knock knock hat, hide and seek, jumping rope, jumps, and ringing the bell, interpretation of the dream that you are hiding in a dream, running away and hiding in a dream for single people, a person may be exposed to many The pressures and problems that hinder his progress in life, but people differ in how they interact with these pressures that they face, and this difference is due to the individual’s mentality and thinking. Seeing her running away and hiding means that she will get rid of the obstacles that bother her and stop her happiness. An unmarried woman running away from a member of her family He gives her good news about her immediate and close marriage. The only escape indicates the safe life she lives after many dangers. Fleeing and covering up are elements of her mystery and the many secrets in her life and her fear of revealing them. Her escape reflects her psychological disturbances and the dilemmas she faces. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lamp in The dream and its effects. Interpretation of dreams to escape from someone who wants to kill me. There are many people who escape from facing the problems they are going through, and everyone finds a suitable way to escape from their problems. Some people see sleep as a way to escape from their reality to the life they desire, and there are those who waste their time watching movies as well. The priest escaping from someone who wants to kill him indicates that his psychological state has improved for the better. Watching the dreamer escaping from someone who intends to kill him suggests that he will be exposed to a certain problem in the coming days. Next. Fleeing and hiding from murder is superficial evidence of judgment, loss, and recklessness. The dreamer’s escape with someone who wants to kill him is evidence of his corruption in life and following his whims. Also, the ability to hide from murder is good news to get rid of the anxiety in which the dreamer lives. Interpretation of a dream about hiding in a dreamThere is There are many reasons that push a person to run and hide, including the person’s feeling of helplessness and inability to do something that creates shortcomings and makes him unmotivated to try, in addition to postponing solving problems, which destroys the person and accumulates problems. . In it. Running away and hiding indicates the envy of others and their hatred for the pioneer. Seeing him running away and hiding indicates the dreamer’s success in his coming days and relief from psychological fatigue. The dreamer’s escape from unknown people is evidence of the dreamer’s suffering, obsessions, and thoughts that disturb his life. A secret vision expresses the dreamer’s inability to bear Responsibility and his disagreements with his family. The dream of hiding indicates the dreamer’s fear of illness and death. Interpretation of the dream of hiding by an unknown person. The game Hide and See is one of the most popular games for children in many countries, which can be played by two or more people. Escaping from an unknown person indicates The dreamer's desire to hide his privacy while hiding from someone
